website_summaries.verdict: A large and attractive tote-style diaper bag that holds plenty of gear.
pros: This stylish bag features 9 exterior pockets and 8 interior pockets to keep you well organized
Comes with cushioned changing pad, clip-on stroller strap, and a removable shoulder pad for the strap
cons: Some reports of straps being damaged too easily

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part fo this diaper bag is how many compartments it has. At first I was not sure what we'd use them all for, but it's allowed my organization-obsessed self to be at ease with finding things quickly when we're out. We are one month in and the bag has, so far, proven to be sturdy and efficient at holding everything we need. My only complaint is about the strap- it is as comfortable as one can be. I haven't had to carry it for long periods of time, but I imagine if we did it might get uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever! Lots of space, not heavy, beautiful, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! My mom bought this for me for Christmas. It hold so much. It helps keep everything organized in my baby's diaper bag. And I love that it has two cup/bottle holders on the inside. This bag has so. much. room. 👏 I wish I would have bought this a year ago when my baby was first born. I've gone through two diaper bags and a regular backpack and didn't like any of them just because they were either small with little storage or bit very many pockets/compartments to keep organized.
customer_reviews.author: Little Hawaiian Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this well-designed, well-made and attractive diaper bag to use as a carry-on for air travel. The roomy outside pockets give me quick and easy access to my hand sanitizer, disinfecting wipes and other items necessary for today's travel. The interior of the bag will comfortably hold a few pieces of clothing, a pair of shoes, and toiletries as well as my tablet and other electronics. The bag, however, is quite light and small enough to fit under the seat of an airplane. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great material but kinda heavy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my baby that's due next year during Amazon prime. I personally took a lot of time researching for a bag I wanted since there are sooooo many out there. I'm happy I settled with this especially on prime day. There is AMPLE storage and pockets. The material is great quality and seems like it would be easy to wipe clean. But I do think its kinda heavy ( little more than 2 lbs). So it might be annoying to carry around. I also kinda regret not getting a bag where the bottle insulation storage area isn't covered and is just a slot on the side. Besides those two points, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag for two kids in Diapers
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a diaper bag that would work for two kids in diapers and I can safely say, after months of use, this is the perfect bag. The bag is divided perfectly so I can keep my toddlers diapers and two sets of clothes on one side, my newborns diapers and two sets of clothes on the other side, wipes on the outside, my bag on needs such as vaseline, thermometer, bandaids ect. in the middle, water bottles, bottles, towels, formula, and there is still room to spare. Anyone looking for a bag for two, this is your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan and Catie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait for this bag to come in! It’s amazing and has so much space and pockets for organization. But one of the snaps broke off after one use, cant return it because I need a diaper bag and don’t have the money to buy a new one and wait for the return to come through. Great purchase if it didn’t break! Was disappointed as it’s amazons choice bag. I also don’t know how to contact the seller directly. Update: they reached out to me right away and are sending me a replacement bag. Great service and very kind, would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Useless pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets inside and out. Only bad thing is the base of the bag is not that wide so when you start to fill the inside pockets there is no room for expansion. You have to stuff your items, it's hard to stay organized when you have to pull items out to find what you need. The outside pockets are the best because....they expand outward. Good bag if you are not needing to pack a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.

customer_reviews.title: Love mine!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag! I have 3 kiddos under 3 and it flawlessly fits all of their needs inside. I carry 3 spare outfits, 3 cups, 3 sets of diapers, toys, snacks, my wallet, and so much more! I call it my Marry Poppins bag. It does get very heavy with all of these items, but so worth it when you have to take it all with you. The over the shoulder strap is fairly comfortable too. I would recommend this bag to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Huge size and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag in in a great size for two kids, and the grey color looks very cute! Uses good quality fabric so has some weight. I've tried a couple diaper bags for my first one and done some research in the diaper bag market and this is definitely one of the roomiest I've seen. Also love the half-price organic cotton bibs that bundle with the bag! Very nice patterns and feel so soft!
customer_reviews.author: YW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the bag for long, and got this one because we are about to become a 2 kid family. We have a 3 year old and a soon to be new born. So far with just my 3 year old I definitely able to take the basics for him, especially since we are potty training. One thing to keep in mind, older kids have bigger clothes, so my 3 year old only needs an extra pair of pants and a couple of pull ups. Baby on the hand will have much more, so there will be plenty of room for everything for her as well. I'm excited to really start using this bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tovey

customer_reviews.title: Great size and features
customer_reviews.text: I got this diaper bag to replace my JujuBe as I wasn’t happy with all the straps and felt like I was limited on space while traveling. While this bag has a bunch of compartments (sometimes gets confusing) I really like how much space I can have when I need it OR how easily I can fold the compartment flat so it’s not as big/bulky. It was a great carry on during our travels this past month holding everything my son and I needed and still had extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diaper bag. I was told to get a backpack bag because it was easier to handle than this style but I always found myself digging to the bottom and there was never enough room for everything! This has plenty of storage and is just as easy to carry around. My only issue with this bag is that the 2 outside compartments have a velcro piece so sometimes baby blankets snag on it but that is easily avoidable. The center compartment is plenty big enough and there are 2 other large storage areas with a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its like the skip hop version
customer_reviews.text: I was looking a diaper bag, i seen the skip hop at target but was $100 to expensive. I went ahead and look on amazon and i came across this one. I read the reviews from other people and i went ahead and order it i just go it yesterday and i loved it, its the same size as the one from target everything except eh brand and design
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Leke Baby Lover for Life!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much happier. I registered for the backpack version of the leke bag and was gifted it at my baby shower. Tried my hardest to learn to love it but it unfortunately just wasn’t my bag, literally lol. This fits me so much better and works better for my comfort level of bag carrying. So happy leke has multiple styles of bags. I have the bottle holder and the additional changing pad too. They’re excellent ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tay Austin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great storage, inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the greatest diaper bag I’ve seen and reviewed, and I reviewed the entire time I was pregnant! This bag has so much storage to it that you will be overwhelmed, but in the best way possible. I thought it would be too big for my liking, but once you get everything needed in your diaper bag, this is the perfect amount of storage with room to spare. Definitely recommend this to the moms like me who want to have everything possibly needed on hand for baby, regardless of where you’re at. It’s not too bulky and the style is right up my alley.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag with lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish bag with tons of room. Great quality for the price also! Has several compartments as well as an insulated area for bottles. Plenty of pockets, deep inside for lots of storage. Only complaint would be to put a cardboard or hard plastic lining in the bottom so it helps it stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Scarcella

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! Super accessible lots of pockets, and super cute! The changing pad was nice compared to most diaper bags I've seen, large and thick. Very roomy diaper bag. I only bought it bc my husband dropped a candle and for wax all over our other one and now I'm glad he did haha
customer_reviews.author: H Gordon

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my daughter for my 9 month old granddaughter. My daughter reported it is stylish, well made and the perfect size for carrying all her needed items to her day care and everywhere else. She was thrilled when she received it. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Cute, large and functional
customer_reviews.text: I’m yet to use this enough to speak to its durability but it seems very sturdy and good quality. It holds a ton of stuff but doesn’t look cartoonishly huge on me even though I’m petite and it’s big. The pocket situation is pretty stellar. So many on the inside and outside. That was the big selling point for me and it did not disappoint. It fits everything I need for me, my baby and toddler with room and pockets to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: So many pockets! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so nice! Very high quality. The fabric feels great and it’s somewhat heavy so you know it’s good materials. The arrows are white, not light blue like some people say. There are a TON of pockets and zippered sections. This is going to work perfectly for baby’s items, plus items for my 4 year old and my wallet and some extras if needed. For $40 it really looks and feels like an $80+ bag. Plus it’s stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Won’t close all the way with 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag, I really did. I have a newborn and a 2 year old. I really tried to pack it light, but with all my kids stuff in, I cannot get the bag to stay closed. Luckily there is a zipper I can use to keep it shut, but the magnet clasp will not stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Balko

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it for very long, I'll update later about the durability. This diper bag is AMAZING! It has so much room and compartments I have extra room! And i am always prepare, I pack alot with me. It is also my purse. It has all baby's stuff as well as mine. The only thing I'm worried about is the magnetic snaps on the outside. They aren't super strong, I for see them not working for long. Everything else about it I love! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Hofstee

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag!! It has over 10 compartments and so much room for everything that my son needs. I switched to this one from a backpack because I couldn’t see anything-I was searching blindly! But with this bag, I can see everything, there’s so much space and the straps are super comfortable. And it’s also super cute and unique!
customer_reviews.author: MrsGSquad

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe how great this bag is at its price!
customer_reviews.text: If you bought this bag at Target, you’d easily pay $80 or more. The material feels like canvas and is very sturdy. All the stitching is perfect and I couldn’t find any weak spots (I’m super picky, I know, haha). The design is fabulous and I LOVE having so many pockets and compartments to organize all my baby things. I went through 5-6 diaper bags with my first two kiddos trying to find the perfect bag and never really found “the one”, but so far, this one has come the closest! I’m so happy!! I honestly have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing diaper bag! So big. I have a 7 month who was needing more storage for food and snacks and such and it fits all her clothes, diapers, food, snacks plus also holds a bunch of snacks or extra clothes for my 5 year old as well. It’s so durable and well made. It’s my favorite diaper bag I’ve ever had. It was more than I usually spend I. Diaper bag but sooooo worth it!!! Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie

customer_reviews.title: So many pockets
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchase and decided to ago ahead and purchase this bag. It is so big! There are so many pockets in this sucker! There's a spot for everything and not just baby stuff either. I've given up using a purse and just use a section of the bag for my wallet, kindle, phone and just odds and ends of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: WackyLady

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I tried those cutesy square bag for maybe a week and I was so frustrated trying to find things all the time. This bag is sooo much more convenient when trying to find things in a rush. I love the feel as it feels so durable and not cheap at all. The design is so cute too! I highly recommend this bag especially for a first time mom who might over pack like I do.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is true that the arrows are a very light blue than white but since I'm having another boy that doesn't matter to me. I love how big and how much room it has in it. There are 3 ways to tote the bag and sooooo many compartments! It matches all my arrows stuff perfectly. (my scripture for my boys is Psalms 127:3-5) I looked everywhere to find a bag with arrows that is reasonable and yet very good quality and this was a perfect fit 💙
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Barton

customer_reviews.title: No carriage clips
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with separate carriage clips as stated in description. There were clips attached to the bag on ribbons, but when used, they leave the bag on a tilt. I contacted Lekebaby and they were unhelpful. I will have to either make do with it as it is or buy my own carriage clips separately.
customer_reviews.author: Benjy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Better diaper bag than what we were able to find in any store; Babies R Us, Walmart, Target, etc. We checked everywhere. This has tons of storage compartments, perfect for extra clothes, diapers, pacifiers, wipes, bottles, and anything else you would need to bring along. It even fit a huge baby blanket we have for the carseat. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: lea90

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would love all the pockets, zippers, buttons, clasps, and straps, but I do! This bag is very well made, fashionable, practical, and fits everything I need with room to spare! Whoever made this knew what they were doing, and engineered this bag to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag! It has several different pockets & compartments for everything you could possibly need and it also comes with a changing pad. It’s a large size diaper bag, but not bulky. Carries very well on the shoulder or as a cross body.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this diaper bag!! My 2.5 year old is still in diapers 🙄 and I have a 7 mo old. Definitely hold a lot of stuff, sometimes I can’t remember which pocket i put stuff in. Has many many pockets, but when you put something in every pocket, gets full very fast and the bag bulges. Don’t really use the zipper on the wipes pouch, but the other end has cooler lined pouch to help keep things cold, LOVE that!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J Steiner

customer_reviews.title: But this!
customer_reviews.text: I am OBSESSED! 1st I ordered this bag fully expecting it to be the size of Texas but I really needed a lot of storage. It’s really not that big compared to your body. Also a huge plus is there are more HUGE pockets and spaces I didn’t even notice just based on the pictures provided. I’m so in love. The quality seems pretty awesome too! No loose strings, thick straps. 👍🏻 I bought to fit for two little ones and I’m not disappointed! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ZaneSader

customer_reviews.title: 2 under 2!
customer_reviews.text: I have two babies and so I upgraded my diaper bag to this one after a lot of research and I'm glad I did! It has a lot of pockets, and slots for both of my children. I have a designated side for each one and it works. It also brings a long strap and a diaper pad. Like this bag a lot! And the design and color makes me look "cool" or so I think.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had a list of things I wanted in a diaper bag and took a while to pick the right one. It had to have an insulated bottle pocket, had to have tote handles, needed to be big enough to fit anything I wanted, needed to have big front pockets to hold my water bottle, needed to have a lot of inner pockets and needed to come with a changing pad. This diaper bag has all of the above plus more. I am very very happy with my purchase and I can see it being useful for multiple kids and for air travel. Looking forward to using it for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: 4 kids under 4 years old!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! I have 4 kids under the age of 4 and need plenty of space for diapers, pull ups and cups of all sizes! This bag fits the bill! It is high quality and has tons of pockets! Perfect for your organized mom that needs all the space she can get!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING...BEYOND AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Uuuhhhhhmazzzing bag! Lightweight and so many dang pockets and storage. I bought this and went back once i got here to purchase one for a friend and it was unavalible... please bring this bag back... or one just like it in different color... everyone needs this bag!! Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Ford

customer_reviews.title: All purpose tote
customer_reviews.text: This is my errand running bag. The mail and lunch fit nicely in the main pocket and the outside pockets hold "to go" drinks without the lids coming off. My hands remain free because of the crossover body strap. I take it everywhere. It holds a lot. Good deal for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly Creature

customer_reviews.title: All in one Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! I wish this was my first diaper bag. I originally had a diaper backpack and it just didn’t have the space I needed. There are so many compartments in this bag. Also it is durable and super lightweight. This has come in handy when I have to leave my son with the grandparents or if we are just out for the day. Definitely a mom must have! And added bonus it comes with a changing pad
customer_reviews.author: Loreal Sands

customer_reviews.title: BEST...DIAPER...BAG... EVERRR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! Love this diaper bag! My 5th child and this is the best I have come by! Large...roomy and Soooo many pockets! My biggest issue will be remembering which pocket I put an item in! Just in love...
customer_reviews.author: AMZ CRAZY

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by this diaper bag. For a relatively cheap bag, this has been amazing! I have a smaller diaper bag that I use for day to day, but this is great for overnights, long trips, or multiple babies. I love all the pockets and how easy it is to organize items inside. The details are well thought out and it is a sturdy, stylish bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not enough space for my friend
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute design. Feminine and masculine. Bought it for a friend and she says she loves it so much but it doesn't hold all that she needs for her newborn. She still may end buying another :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather Helberg

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I hated my old diaper bag because I couldn’t reach into it while also holding my child. This one is so much better. Fits everything I need and I can have my hands full and still am able to reach in and grab what I need. Plus it’s super cute and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: So spacious
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability, and how it sits up. So spacious. I can easily store extra outfits and blankets and it'll zip right up. A lot lighter then initially thought. A must have
customer_reviews.author: Baked Beanz

customer_reviews.title: Super Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a gift for a mom-to be. She’s thrilled with the size, weight and the way the bag is laid out, it has very easy access to all those needed items.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good size! Very spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a diaper bag that would be nice size to carry for longer trips. I have a small diaper bag which i plan on using for daily/short trip and this one is perfect for either daily use or overnight bag!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE QUALITY!! the best thing i love about this bag is i can either hold it in hand or do it in other position. Not to mention it's great size that is perfect for the storage. the shipping is as good as always, the price is not the cheapest in Amazon but I think it deserves everything! Hopefully it will last long :)
customer_reviews.author: flora168

customer_reviews.title: perfect size of bag it can hold everything
customer_reviews.text: this bag is tall it can hold my daughter flask which is an A for me, very spacious with a lot of compartment, the material is really strong i made a great choice
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of compartments!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It has plenty of pockets and compartments. Let's not forget it's stylish. It does take some getting used to compared to my other diaper bag. I don't like the fact that the changing pad can only fit in the inside of the bag. Then again my old diaper bag I always kept it in the outside pocket. I won't be able to tell the durability until much later, but I hope it lasts for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage sections!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for moms that are super organized and love to pack extra. There are so many sections to keep everything in place and organized. Overall, great bag. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa santiago

customer_reviews.title: It’s stylish
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets. Big and like the overal design. The bag is a bit too flimsy as the frame of bag does not stay up because of soft material. However a great bag for parents on the go
customer_reviews.author: NemesisNash

customer_reviews.title: Design on bag clips are different than in pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the whole reason why i decided on this bag was because my main priority was it had a wAy to hang with the clips on the stroller and there missing. It came with a diffeent design already attached to the bag that dosent have a way to hid them or take off because there sowed in to the bag. Ill be happier once i get to clips to make it work. But now i have to waste more money
customer_reviews.author: Brenda lupian

customer_reviews.title: This bag has it all!
customer_reviews.text: PLENTY of space, several pockets for organizing, and 3 carrying options (handles, shoulder strap, stroller clips). Plus very stylish! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Best bag yet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! Plenty of room while still being organized. Durable materials and easily wipes clean. Stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: MoonDreamer715

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag, quality seems good. Just a tiny disappointed it doesn't fit as much as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: jamie vargas

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent so much money on diaper bags and this is one of the least expensive ones that I’ve ever bought. Yet, it is hand down my favorite! I love everything about it. So much room, easy to carry, and just an all around perfect bag. It may not be as durable as some higher end bags, but at the price point I don’t see that as an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyt

customer_reviews.title: Very Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: It was for my granddaughter and her mom loves it. The nurses asked whereshe got it from. It has so many compartments.
customer_reviews.author: nicky

customer_reviews.title: Love love love! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! Had one and liked it a lot but wanted something a little bigger/maybe more pockets. Searched and searched finally decided to try this one and so glad I did! It’s amazing! Definitely recommend! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room and light weight. We had a backpack diaper bag before and switched because we needed more room. Wouldn't recommend a backpack diaper bag after having this one. It is easy to open up and find what you need. Pleanty of storage for baby and parent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greats for two kids under two.
customer_reviews.text: Great for two kids under two. The only reason I left off a star is because the flaps don’t stay completely closed all the time. Has lots of different compartments to stay organized though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: It is a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift, but it was requested in a baby registry, so t was wanted
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Huge bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is enormous and great for two kids. The whole thing is waterproof and will be good for swimming and holding wet towels and suits. Tons of pockets and sections. I like that you can show or hide the arrow patterned part by folding down the straps. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Naott

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! We needed a bag for daycare with space for her bottles, formula, change of clothes, snacks, toys and all the usual goodies! I love the zipper sections and the exterior open pockets we can pop her cup etc into. Good quality fabric and cute neutral design.
customer_reviews.author: Christeva

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just WOW!! Good quality! Good price! For $40? Can’t beat this! So much pockets inside and outside! Lots of storage space! Tag price was $89.99!!! Somehow it’s only $40! I love it love it!
customer_reviews.author: K.L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag. So much room and so many pockets! Fits everything I need for 2 kids and there is plenty of room for more things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stroller straps are a no go.
customer_reviews.text: Love it all except the stroller straps. Like what the hell are those even about?! I bought some different ones for like $8 cuz any way I tried it they just don’t work. Oh well Bag holds a heck of a lot of baby crap lol
customer_reviews.author: james vandermeersche

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this diaper bag. It is lightweight yet has so many pockets and compartments. It really expands to fit all that I need, yet still feels lightweight. I used it for traveling on my own with my baby and used it as a satchel.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Torres

customer_reviews.title: if you have more than one baby this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag but is a little too big for one baby. the bigger the bag the more unnecessary things you will put in there other than that it really good. perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use as a carry-on, not a diaper bag. Haven't used it yet, but I think it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Capps

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect! I have got many compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: I have two under the age of one! I needed something big and roomy, this is perfect! I have got many compliments on it! After I use it has a diaper bag I'll use it as a weekend get away bag for weekend trips with my husband! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: CMansell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bag sent to me is broken, the strap came broken. I'm very disappointed. The stitches on the bag are coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Prophetess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this bag!! I'm a new mother of twins and really underestimated the amount of things you need for a baby let alone 2. This bag is big enough for everything I need for my girls plus a pocket for mommy's stuff without being too bulky. Its extremely comfortable to carry and I love the adjustable stroller straps. The 1st bag I got I had to send back but the return/exchange was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesika Mac Dougall

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I could tell this bag was going to be better than my current diaper bag as soon as I opened the box. Plenty of large pockets with and without zippers and the middle section opens up wide enough to fit toys, diapers, and more. Only downside is the magnetic clip seems a little loose already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect diaper bag. It's not too bulky, too large, but it has plenty of storage space and looks really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina _With.a.K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect X-Large Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Huge bag just what I was looking for! Fits everything I need. Awesome for multiple kids. After they out grow it will make a great travel bag!
customer_reviews.author: LOLO

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this diaper bag because it seemed so functional
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this diaper bag because it seemed so functional: large with many pockets. However, after about 3 weeks the main button magnet fell off. I contacted the company and they responded right away. I explained the whole issue and sent the images of the defective bag. They let me keep the defective bag and have sent the new one within a week. Thank you for the outstanding customer service and the beautiful diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag. It has lots of pockets and storage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rosling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Gave as a gift. Purchased with matching changing pad and insulated bottle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Yen Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Big, fits a lot. Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big bag with lots of pockets. Easy to access things and it looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: I still use it my baby is 1 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I still use it my baby is 1 year old. Yet if you're looking for something small and practical it might be to big.
customer_reviews.author: Erika P.

customer_reviews.title: Inspect the product right away.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I slid my hand in one of the pockets on the inside, my finger poked though the bottom seam. So if I use that pocket it will be lost between the inner lining and the outside fabric. On the upside, I emailed their customer support (over the weekend) and they've responded very professionally and timely.
customer_reviews.author: Alby and Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Yes . 4th bag is a charm !
customer_reviews.text: Bag is awesome ! Only complaint was flimsy-ness so ct the box it came in and put it at bottom of bag . Tons of pockets , beautiful bag . I can carry my stuff desperate from the babies in one bag . Large enough but not obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sicilia

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable & Handy
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this bag for my 2 year old daughter.This bag has helped me fit in all her essentials required for day care.. sometimes i use for gym & casual shopping .I find this multipurpose bag very useful.I highly recommend this product for any casual purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets to hold diapers, snacks, clothes, toys and much more. Everything stays well organized. Easy to carry baby and bag. Good for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sukhman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag for only two times in the second time the shoulder strap damaged like shown in the photo I feel sorry for that and I was shocked for this damage which means low quality. I don’t recommend this for anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Ayman saleh

customer_reviews.title: Well made, lots of storage space, and great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diaper bag. It has tons of pockets and compartments. It is very well made. I like the neutral design. Even my husband likes this diaper bag! Very pleased with this purchase. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much! I have two kids in diapers and I needed a big bag, this one isn’t even half full with all the stuff I have in it for my babies. So much room and so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Phillips

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! So much room, material is great and looks classy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Rahaf Kain

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this bag so far! I wanted something smaller than the giant bag I had before. I like that there are so many pockets and places to separate things. I use it for two toddlers. Can fit everything I need in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! So many compartments and is very well made. Origanlky bought a backpack and found it wasn’t big enough and was hard to see everything in bag because it was so deep
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Schwyn

customer_reviews.title: So spacious. So great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend's baby shower and immediately had to buy my own. I use it as my pump/lunch bag as well as my purse. I carry everything in it that I need to pump (Spectra pump), my daily water and lunch. Everything fits great and I just love it! It seems to be very high quality so far, even with all that I carry in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana K

customer_reviews.title: ... but I can already tell this bag will be awesome. The print on mine is exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet as I am still pregnant but I can already tell this bag will be awesome. The print on mine is exactly as pictured. Love that it is stylish and not obviously a diaper bag. Tons of pockets. Very affordable. Big without being too oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy! And good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. I just received it today, so I will update the review of the quality doesn’t seem to stand up. It appears to be made of good quality and it’s spacious. There are also compartments galore! I may loose my stuff, not remembering what compartment I put it in. There are three zipper compartments aside from the big/main compartment. Plus countless other pockets. It also includes the diaper mat.
customer_reviews.author: Topher2017

customer_reviews.title: Not that heavy to carry around.
customer_reviews.text: Two sections for my two children, 2 years and one is 8 weeks. Very well made. I like it a lot, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! It has lots of pockets and is perfect for a new mom who likes to carry EVERYTHING! It's good quality, looks like the picture, and I was very pleased with this purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is really big with tons of pockets however it was too big for what i needed
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag, heavy duty fabric, so much space! So many pockets! I will be able to fit everything needed for my newborn and 18 month old with pockets and room to spare. So glad I went with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Just my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very attractive. It is a little heavy even without the baby necessities.
customer_reviews.author: papaya

customer_reviews.title: The bag is absolutely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The material is water resistant and doesn't collect dirt or smudges. The pockets are spacious and convenient. There are 3 insulated pockets in the main compartment, milk keeps its temperature (warm or cold) for a while when stored in them. I appreciate the "mommy pocket" in the front for easy access to the stuff I would have normally carried in a purse. This bag is absolutely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: linda

product_meta.title: Lekebaby Diaper Bag Tote Purse Satchel Diaper Messenger for Mom and Girls Grey, Arrow Print
feature_bullets: Large Storage: Plenty of storage options to carry all the essentials and keep you organized, 9 exterior pockets and 8 interior pockets, it is not just for baby, it is also for you

Ease Of Use: Everything is still easy access and convenient to put away, organized space for mom and baby, separate pockets for not only diapers, nursing cover, and wipes, but also for your wallet, keys, sunglasses, and other toiletries
Features & Accessories: Convert from a hand bag to a messenger diaper bag, water-resistant fabric and lining for easy to clean, includes cushioned changing mat, clip-on stroller strap

Stylish Diaper Bag: The design is perfect for someone who wants a diaper bag that looks like a tote or weekend bag, it looks like a stylish handbag, yet has all the functions needed in a diaper bag, no one will ever know you're carrying a diaper bag
Satisfaction Guarantee: We provide 30 DAYS MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE for any reason and 180 DAYS WARRANTY for quality-related issues, take it, and you'll know this is one of stylish diaper bag you want
